name: OpenStreetMap Foundation
goal:
OpenStreetMap is an initiative to create and provide free geographic data, such as street maps, to anyone.

The OpenStreetMap Foundation is an international not-for-profit organization supporting, but not controlling, the OpenStreetMap Project. It is dedicated to encouraging the growth, development and distribution of free geospatial data and to providing geospatial data for anyone to use and share
interests: Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Environment, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Data protection, privacy and intellectual property regulation. Any initiatives that impact the ability and the right of our community to collect geographic data.
